review.title: “Working at Under Z Group”
review.pros: Pros – Great place to meet Chinese people from China, Taiwan, and Hong Kong. If you want to learn Chinese, it's an OK place to be.
review.cons: Cons – Overtime without any pay. You will have to sacrifice your time 7-days a week. Traveling without any meal nor travel expenses.
review.advice-to-management: Advice to Senior Management – Slave labor, obviously not the greatest place to work.
